definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
diagnosis and treatment based on an overall analysis of the illness and the patient's condition
pattern-syndrome identification based on the eight principles (TCM)

sentences.english: At level seven, one would experience unconditional love and no judgmental thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 在第七級別，人就會獲得自由的愛和辨證的思想。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effectiveness of treatment based syndrome differentiation for bronchial asthma.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察中醫療法辨證治療支氣管哮喘的療效。

sentences.english: Or, whether it fits for all diseases of internal medicine, not only those caused by exogenous pathogenic agents?
sentences.chinese: 六經辨證是否同時既適用於傷寒病又適用於雜病？

sentences.english: This article introduces the clinical experience in the treatment of androgenic alopecia.
sentences.chinese: 介紹中醫辨證治療雄激素源性脫髮的臨牀經驗。

sentences.english: Methods:360 plums he spirit the sufferer presses Chinese medicine dialectics the cent type proceed treatment.
sentences.chinese: 方法將360例梅核氣患者按中醫辨證分型進行治療。

sentences.english: Combine the industry and markets actual, did the analysis of the dialectics .
sentences.chinese: 結合產業與市場實際，做了辨證的分析。

sentences.english: To choose different drugs based on different stages of arthralgia syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 根據痹證不同時期的病理特點，提出分期辨證用藥。

sentences.english: The inner treatment pays attention to whole body in accordance and starts from syndrome differentiation and treatment method.
sentences.chinese: 內治法從整體觀念著手，以辨證論治爲依歸。

sentences.english: Three problems of treatment based on syndrome differentiation, TBSD are discussed here.
sentences.chinese: 着重探討了有關辨證論治的三大問題。

sentences.english: The dialectical materialism philosophic thought is generally implied in theory and practice of accounting.
sentences.chinese: 會計理論和實踐中普遍滲透着辨證唯物主義哲學思想。

sentences.english: To evaluate the usability of endoscopy for the diagnosis of rhinorrhea.
sentences.chinese: 評價鼻內窺鏡應用於鼻淵辨證施治中的價值。

sentences.english: Objectives To discuss the methods of treating acute cerebral infarction with differentiating cold and heat syndromes.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討運用寒熱辨證治療急性腦梗死的方法。

sentences.english: It is indicated that treatment of amenia based on differentiation of syndromes and the endometrial thickness have close correlativity.
sentences.chinese: 說明閉經的辨證論治與子宮內膜厚度有密切的相關性。

sentences.english: Objective:Observe dialectics cent the type cures the clinical curative effect of the plum he spirit.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察辨證分型治療梅核氣的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Therefore it was important to emphasize the role of wind-evil in the pathogenesis of palmus in the syndrome differentiation.
sentences.chinese: 在辨證論治的前提下，重視風邪爲患在發病中的作用。

sentences.english: The theoretic system of traditional Chinese medicine is characterized by the concept of organic wholeness and treatment based on syndrome differentiation.
sentences.chinese: 中醫學理論體系的基本特點是整體觀和辨證論治。

definition: interpretation of the cause/onset and process of an illness/pathogenesis
Chinese and Western medicine/a doctor trained in Chinese and Western medicine
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness

(TCM) the four methods of diagnosis, namely 望診|望诊[wang4 zhen3] (observation), 聞診|闻诊[wen2 zhen3] (auscultation and olfaction), 問診|问诊[wen4 zhen3] (interrogation), 切診|切诊[qie4 zhen3] (pulse feeling and palpation)
medicinal dietary supplement that helps build up one's health
condition or type of pulse (in Chinese medicine)
